en: Ashraddhadhaanaah purushaa dharmasyaasya parantapa;

mni-Mtei: ꯑꯩꯕꯨ ꯌꯧꯍꯟꯗꯅꯥ ꯁꯤꯕꯒꯤ ꯃꯥꯂꯦꯝ ꯑꯁꯤꯒꯤ ꯂꯝꯕꯤꯗꯥ ꯍꯜꯂꯀꯎ!

en: Bhootabhrinna cha bhootastho mamaatmaa bhootabhaavanah

en: Yathaakaashasthito nityam vaayuh sarvatrago mahaan;

Prakritim swaamavashtabhya visrijaami punah punah;
Bhootagraamamimam kritsnamavasham prakritervashaat

en: acts!
Mayaa’dhyakshena prakritih sooyate sacharaacharam;

en: Avajaananti maam moodhaah maanusheem tanumaashritam;

mni-Mtei: o ꯂꯣꯇꯁ-ꯑꯥꯏꯗꯦꯗ ꯂꯔꯗ, ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯅꯍꯥꯛꯀꯤ ꯏꯅꯑꯦꯛꯁꯍꯥꯎꯁ ꯇꯧꯕꯥ ꯌꯥꯕꯥ ꯑꯊꯣꯏꯕꯥ ꯑꯗꯨꯁꯨ!

en: Evametadyathaattha twamaatmaanam parameshwara;
Drashtumicchaami te roopamaishwaram purushottama
3. (Now), O Supreme Lord, as Thou hast thus described Thyself, O Supreme Person, I wish

en: to see Thy Divine Form!
Manyase yadi tacchakyam mayaa drashtumiti prabho;
mni-Mtei: ꯃꯌꯥꯃꯁꯦ ꯌꯥꯗꯤ ꯇꯆꯀꯌꯝ ꯃꯥꯌꯥꯌꯥ ꯗ꯭ꯔꯁꯇꯨꯃꯤꯇꯤ ꯄ꯭ꯔꯚꯣ;

en: Yogeshwara tato me twam darshayaatmaanamavyayam
4. If Thou, O Lord, thinkest it possible for me to see it, do Thou, then, O Lord of the Yogis,
mni-Mtei: 4. ꯀꯔꯤꯒꯨꯝꯕꯥ ꯅꯍꯥꯛꯅꯥ, ꯍꯦ ꯏꯕꯨꯡꯉꯣ, ꯑꯩꯅꯥ ꯃꯁꯤ ꯎꯕꯥ ꯉꯃꯒꯅꯤ ꯍꯥꯌꯅꯥ ꯈꯜꯂꯕꯗꯤ, ꯅꯍꯥꯛꯅꯥ ꯌꯣꯒꯤꯁꯤꯡꯒꯤ ꯃꯄꯨ ꯑꯣꯏꯌꯨ ꯍꯥꯌꯅꯥ ꯇꯧ, ꯅꯍꯥꯛꯅꯥ .

en: show me Thy imperishable Self!
Sri Bhagavaan Uvaacha:
Pashya me paartha roopaani shatasho’tha sahasrashah;
mni-Mtei: ꯄꯁ꯭ꯌ ꯃꯦ ꯄꯥꯔꯊ ꯔꯨꯄꯥꯅꯤ ꯁꯇꯥꯁꯣ’ꯊꯥ ꯁꯥꯍꯥꯁꯔꯁꯥꯍ;

en: Naanaavidhaani divyaani naanaavarnaakriteeni cha
The Blessed Lord said:
5. Behold, O Arjuna, My forms by the hundreds and thousands, of different sorts, divine and
mni-Mtei: ꯵.ꯌꯦꯡꯎ, ꯑꯣ ꯑꯔꯖꯨꯟ, ꯑꯩꯒꯤ ꯐꯣꯔꯝ ꯑꯁꯤ ꯂꯤꯁꯤꯡ ꯀꯌꯥ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯂꯤꯁꯤꯡ ꯀꯌꯥꯅꯥ ꯇꯣꯉꯥꯟ ꯇꯣꯉꯥꯅꯕꯥ ꯃꯈꯂꯒꯤ, ꯗꯤꯚꯥꯏꯟ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ

en: of various colours and shapes!
Pashyaadityaan vasoon rudraan ashwinau marutastathaa;
Bahoonyadrishtapoorvaani pashyaashcharyaani bhaarata

mni-Mtei: 6. ꯑꯥꯗꯤꯠꯌꯁꯤꯡ, ꯋꯥꯁꯁ, ꯔꯨꯗ꯭ꯔꯁꯤꯡ, ꯑꯁ꯭ꯕꯤꯟ ꯑꯅꯤ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯃꯔꯨꯁꯤꯡꯁꯨ ꯌꯦꯡꯎ;

en: many wonders never seen before, O Arjuna!
mni-Mtei: ꯃꯃꯥꯡꯗꯥ ꯎꯈꯤꯗ꯭ꯔꯤꯕꯥ ꯑꯉꯀꯄꯥ ꯀꯌꯥ, ꯑꯣ ꯑꯔꯖꯨꯟ!

en: Ihaikastham jagatkritsnam pashyaadya sacharaacharam;
Mama dehe gudaakesha yachchaanyad drashtumicchasi

mni-Mtei: ꯷.ꯍꯧꯖꯤꯛ ꯌꯦꯡꯕꯤꯌꯨ, ꯑꯣ ꯑꯔꯖꯨꯟ, ꯃꯁꯤꯗꯥ, ꯑꯩꯒꯤ ꯍꯀꯆꯥꯡ, ꯌꯨꯅꯤꯚꯔꯁ ꯄꯨꯝꯕꯥ ꯁꯦꯟꯇꯔꯗꯥ ꯁꯦꯟꯇꯔ ꯇꯧꯗꯨꯅꯥ .

en: one—including the moving and the unmoving—and whatever else thou desirest to see!
mni-Mtei: ꯑꯃꯅꯥ—ꯆꯠꯊꯣꯛ-ꯆꯠꯁꯤꯟ ꯇꯧꯕꯥ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯆꯠꯄꯥ ꯌꯥꯗꯕꯥ—ꯑꯗꯨꯒꯥ ꯅꯍꯥꯛꯅꯥ ꯎꯕꯥ ꯄꯥꯃꯖꯕꯥ ꯑꯇꯩ ꯀꯔꯤꯒꯨꯝꯕꯥ ꯑꯃꯠꯇꯥ!

en: BHAGAVAD GITA
Na tu maam shakyase drashtum anenaiva swachakshushaa;

en: Divyam dadaami te chakshuh pashya me yogamaishwaram
mni-Mtei: ꯗꯤꯕ꯭ꯌꯝ ꯗꯥꯗꯥꯃꯤ ꯇꯦ ꯆꯛꯁꯨꯍ ꯄꯁ꯭ꯌ ꯃꯤ ꯌꯣꯒꯃꯥꯏꯁꯋꯥꯔꯝ

en: behold My lordly Yoga
COMMENTARY: No fleshy eye can behold Me in My Cosmic Form. One can see Me
mni-Mtei: ꯀꯃꯦꯟꯇꯔꯤ: ꯑꯩꯒꯤ ꯀꯣꯁ꯭ꯃꯤꯛꯀꯤ ꯃꯑꯣꯡꯗꯥ ꯑꯩꯒꯤ ꯃꯤꯠꯌꯦꯡ ꯑꯃꯠꯇꯥ ꯎꯕꯥ ꯉꯃꯗꯦ꯫

en: only through the eye of intuition or the divine eye. It should not be confused with seeing through the
mni-Mtei: ꯏꯟꯠꯌꯨꯏꯇꯤꯖꯃꯒꯤ ꯃꯤꯠꯌꯦꯡ ꯅꯠꯠꯔꯒꯥ ꯗꯤꯚꯥꯏꯟ ꯑꯥꯏꯒꯤ ꯈꯨꯠꯊꯥꯡꯗꯥ ꯈꯛꯇꯃꯛ꯫

en: physical eye or through the mind. It is an inner divine experience attained through intense devotion
and concentration
Sanjaya Uvaacha:
Evamuktwaa tato raajan mahaayogeshwaro harih;
Darshayaamaasa paarthaaya paramam roopamaishwaram
Sanjaya said:

en: His supreme form as the Lord!
Anekavaktra nayanam anekaadbhuta darshanam;
Anekadivyaabharanam divyaanekodyataayudham

en: Divyamaalyaambaradharam divyagandhaanulepanam;
Sarvaashcharyamayam devam anantam vishwatomukham

en: Divi sooryasahasrasya bhavedyugapadutthitaa;
Yadi bhaah sadrishee saa syaadbhaasastasya mahaatmanah

en: Tatraikastham jagatkritsnam pravibhaktamanekadhaa;
Apashyaddevadevasya shareere paandavastadaa

mni-Mtei: 13. ꯃꯐꯝ ꯑꯗꯨꯗꯥ, ꯏꯁ꯭ꯕꯔꯒꯤ ꯏꯁ꯭ꯕꯔꯒꯤ ꯍꯀꯆꯥꯡꯗꯥ, ꯑꯔꯖꯨꯟꯅꯥ ꯃꯗꯨꯒꯤ ꯃꯇꯨꯡꯗꯥ ꯌꯨꯅꯤꯚꯔꯁ ꯄꯨꯝꯕꯥ ꯑꯗꯨ ꯎꯈꯤ ꯫

en: one, with its many groups
Tatah sa vismayaavishto hrishtaromaa dhananjayah;
Pranamya shirasaa devam kritaanjalirabhaashata
THE YOGA OF THE VISION OF THE COSMIC FORM

mni-Mtei: 14. ꯃꯗꯨꯒꯤ ꯃꯇꯨꯡꯗꯥ, ꯑꯔꯖꯨꯟꯅꯥ, ꯑꯉꯀꯄꯥ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯃꯊꯛꯇꯥ ꯂꯦꯞꯂꯤꯕꯥ ꯆꯨꯝꯅꯒꯤ ꯐꯤꯔꯣꯜ ꯁꯦꯠꯂꯒꯥ ꯃꯍꯥꯛꯀꯤ ꯃꯀꯣꯛ ꯊꯣꯡꯕꯗꯥ ꯅꯣꯛꯂꯒꯥ ꯆꯠꯈꯤ꯫

en: the Lord and spoke with joined palms
mni-Mtei: ꯏꯕꯨꯡꯉꯣ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯖꯣꯏꯟꯇ ꯄꯥꯃꯁꯀꯥ ꯋꯥꯔꯤ ꯁꯥꯅꯈꯤ

en: Arjuna Uvaacha:
Pashyaami devaamstava deva dehe
Sarvaamstathaa bhootavisheshasanghaan;
Brahmaanameesham kamalaasanastha-
Mrisheemshcha sarvaanuragaamshcha divyaan
Arjuna said:

en: Brahma, the Lord, seated on the lotus, all the sages and the celestial serpents!
mni-Mtei: ꯕ꯭ꯔꯍ꯭ꯃꯥ, ꯏꯕꯨꯡꯉꯣ, ꯂꯣꯇꯁꯇꯥ ꯐꯃꯗꯨꯅꯥ ꯂꯩꯕꯥ, ꯔ꯭ꯏꯁꯤ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯁꯦꯂꯦꯁ꯭ꯇꯤꯑꯦꯜ ꯁꯔꯄꯟꯆ ꯄꯨꯝꯅꯃꯛ!

en: Anekabaahoodaravaktranetram
Pashyaami twaam sarvato’nantaroopam;
Naantam na madhyam na punastavaadim
Pashyaami vishweshwara vishwaroopa
16. I see Thee of boundless form on every side, with many arms, stomachs, mouths and
mni-Mtei: 16. ꯑꯩꯅꯥ ꯅꯉꯕꯨ ꯃꯥꯏꯀꯩ ꯈꯨꯗꯤꯡꯗꯥ ꯉꯃꯈꯩ ꯂꯩꯇꯕꯥ ꯃꯑꯣꯡꯒꯤ, ꯈꯨꯠ, ꯈꯣꯡꯎꯞ, ꯃꯤꯠ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ .

en: eyes; neither the end nor the middle nor also the beginning do I see, O Lord of the universe, O
Cosmic Form!
Kireetinam gadinam chakrinam cha,
Tejoraashim sarvato deeptimantam;
Pashyaami twaam durnireekshyam samantaad
17. I see Thee with the diadem, the club and the discus, a mass of radiance shining

en: Twamaksharam paramam veditavyam
Twamasya vishwasya param nidhaanam;
Twamavyayah shaashwatadharmagoptaa
Sanaatanastwam purusho mato me
18. Thou art the Imperishable, the Supreme Being, worthy of being known; Thou art the
mni-Mtei: 18. ꯅꯍꯥꯛ ꯑꯁꯤ ꯏꯝꯄꯦꯔꯤꯁꯦꯕꯜ, ꯈ꯭ꯕꯥꯏꯗꯒꯤ ꯋꯥꯡꯕꯥ ꯃꯤꯑꯣꯏꯅꯤ, ꯈꯉꯅꯕꯒꯤ ꯃꯊꯧ ꯇꯥꯕꯥ;

en: great treasure-house of this universe; Thou art the imperishable protector of the eternal Dharma;
Thou art the ancient Person, I deem
mni-Mtei: thou art the ancient person, ꯑꯩꯅꯥ ꯂꯧꯏ .

en: Anaadimadhyaantamanantaveeryam
Anantabaahum shashisooryanetram;
Pashyaami twaam deeptahutaashavaktram
Swatejasaa vishwamidam tapantam

Arjuna Uvaacha:
Sthaane hrisheekesha tava prakeertyaa
Jagat prahrishyatyanurajyate cha;
Rakshaamsi bheetaani disho dravanti
Sarve namasyanti cha siddhasanghaah
Arjuna said:

en: Kasmaachcha te na nameran mahaatman
Gareeyase brahmano’pyaadikartre;
Ananta devesha jagannivaasa
Twamaksharam sadasattatparam yat

mni-Mtei: ꯃꯗꯨ ꯖꯤꯕ ꯑꯃꯁꯨꯡ ꯅꯟ-ꯕꯤꯌꯤꯡꯒꯤ ꯃꯄꯥꯟꯗꯥ ꯂꯩꯕꯥ)꯫

en: COMMENTARY: The Lord is Mahatma. He is greater than all else. He is the
imperishable, so He is the proper object of worship, love and delight

en: Twayaa tatam vishwamanantaroopa

Vaayuryamo’gnirvarunah shashaankah
BHAGAVAD GITA
Prajaapatistwam prapitaamahashcha;
Namo namaste’stu sahasrakritwah
Punashcha bhooyo’pi namo namaste

en: Namah purastaadatha prishthataste
Namo’stu te sarvata eva sarva;
Anantaveeryaamitavikramastwam
Sarvam samaapnoshi tato’si sarvah

All! Thou infinite in power and prowess, pervadest all; wherefore Thou art all
Sakheti matwaa prasabham yaduktam
He krishna he yaadava he sakheti;
mni-Mtei: ꯃꯍꯥꯛꯅꯥ ꯀ꯭ꯔ꯭ꯏꯁ꯭ꯟ ꯃꯍꯥꯛꯅꯥ ꯌꯥꯗꯥꯕ ꯃꯍꯥꯛꯅꯥ ꯁꯈꯇꯤ;

en: Ajaanataa mahimaanam tavedam
Mayaa pramaadaat pranayena vaapi

Yachchaavahaasaartham asatkrito’si
Vihaarashayyaasanabhojaneshu;
Eko’thavaapyachyuta tatsamaksham
Tatkshaamaye twaamaham aprameyam

Prasaadaye twaamahameeshameedyam;
Piteva putrasya sakheva sakhyuh
Priyah priyaayaarhasi deva sodhum
THE YOGA OF THE VISION OF THE COSMIC FORM

Mayaa prasannena tavaarjunedam

The Blessed Lord said:

Evam roopah shakya aham nriloke
Drashtum twadanyena karupraveera

BHAGAVAD GITA
